attributes.action: Give Passenger Transport Executives more "control" over Private Bus Operators
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The performance of a major bus operator in the Northen area of Greater Manchester (namely First Manchester) are below the standard expected of Bus Users and the Passenger Transport Authority who monitor such services are powerless to force them to resolve their shortcomings. It is therefore esseential that the PTA is given the necessary regulatory powers to enforce service reliability with severe financial penalties for any failures.
